# changeMe - 100-Day Task Tracker

This is a React + Tailwind CSS web application for tracking daily routine tasks over 100 days.

## Project Complete âœ…

- [x] Vite + React project scaffolded
- [x] Tailwind CSS configured
- [x] Complete task tracker functionality implemented
- [x] Local storage persistence
- [x] Mobile responsive design
- [x] Development server running on http://localhost:5173/
- [x] Complete documentation provided

## Key Components

- `TaskManager.jsx` - Add and manage routine tasks
- `DayTracker.jsx` - Daily task checklist with navigation
- `ProgressOverview.jsx` - Progress statistics and motivation
- `App.jsx` - Main application with state management

## Features Implemented

- Add daily routine tasks once, auto-generate for 100 days
- Navigate between Day 1-100 with task completion tracking
- Visual progress indicators and motivational messages
- Persistent data storage using localStorage
- Clean, minimal UI optimized for mobile
